description:
Designed in partnership with multiple Downhill World Championship Greg Minnaar, this all-conditions tire has tall, sharp knobs to punch through dust and loam to find grip. Hard-packed, muddy, dry or rooty, the Assegai provides grip and cornering for riders at the top of the sport.

  • 3C Maxx Grip uses 3 soft rubber compounds to boost traction
  • EXO+ protection reduces the chances of punctures and sidewall cutting
  • Wide trail spacing is optimized for 35mm inner width rims
  • Tubeless-ready
name: Maxxis Assegai 29in. TR 3C Maxx Grip EXO+ Folding Tire
